channel.title: [ADVICE] Demonic Scimitar [ADVICE]
channel.description: OK I have just made my first model, you can probably tell it's just an edited version of the Dragon scimitar but meh, I don't care, so here it is [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/demonicscimitar.jpg[/img] The problem with it is, when I weild it, you turn invisable! How do I sort this?

item.title: [ADVICE] Demonic Scimitar [ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“BoneArmyProductions, post:15, topic:274090”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=362170.msg2760038#msg2760038 date=1240460928]

convert it to .dat gzip it.

oh yea: stop with the shit recolors please(this is a msg to all)

He didnt recolour he edited the look

here, a recolor is clasified as any previously made jagex model that has been warped/stretched ,recolored, or edited in any way.

i dont care can u make a better 1?

better what? model? yes. recolor? yea. recolors are stupid.
[/quote]
so u do think your better![/quote]
I think i can DO better. no where did i state i think im better than anyone. seriously, come up with arguements that make sense, im sick of your 8y/o arguing techniques. there bullshit.

Read full topic

item.title: [ADVICE] Demonic Scimitar [ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

dylan_0789:

or you can do the CJ/ACF/Linksys way and trace things (aka. the “drawing” technique.) I prefer the cube way, you learn faster.

Every single one of my guitars (and every model before that) was done free hand.
Just thought i’d drop in that note.
I only draw them out now because i can, i mean why not, it just saves a lot of time, doesn’t require any less skill, except maybe good eyes and a better memory.

Anyways try to make more models from scratch, use the create tool, handy tool.

Read full topic

item.title: [ADVICE] Demonic Scimitar [ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“krazy karl, post:5, topic:274090”]I’m still learning how to use the programme and I find playing about with it helps, I wouldn’t normaly re-colour as I do want to make my own but there are still some things I don’t understand yet. If there was a tutorial on how to use it and make your own model then that would help EVERYONE!

Also I did convert it and G.zip it or else how could I of got it in the game?[/quote]
glad to see you dont intend to keep up with recolors. if you got it into the game then itd show up. you said it was invisible. OH did u set Check off Triangle priorities and set Tri Pri to 10.

there are a few tutorials. heres my VERY simple and non explanatory one:

  1. create a cube.
  2. bump up subdivisions to how you want.
  3. scale it accordingly to a sword.
  4. use another cube for a hilt.
  5. use a cylinder for a handle.

basically, you just scale, subdivide(or knife tool later on), move, stretch, etc. or you can do the CJ/ACF/Linksys way and trace things (aka. the “drawing” technique.) I prefer the cube way, you learn faster.

Read full topic

item.title: [ADVICE] Demonic Scimitar [ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I’m still learning how to use the programme and I find playing about with it helps, I wouldn’t normaly re-colour as I do want to make my own but there are still some things I don’t understand yet. If there was a tutorial on how to use it and make your own model then that would help EVERYONE!

Also I did convert it and G.zip it or else how could I of got it in the game?

Read full topic
